headline.main: Wildfire Warnings Posted in Southern Plains, Florida

headline.main: Putin Hopes for Steps to Restore Ties With U.S. After Trump Takes Office

headline.main: European Cities Ramp Up Security for New Year After Berlin Attack
headline.print_headline: European Cities Ramp Up Security for New Year After Berlin Attack

docs.snippet: European capitals tightened security on Friday ahead of New Year's celebrations, erecting concrete barriers in city centers and boosting police numbers after the Islamic State attack in Berlin last week that killed 12 people....
docs.lead_paragraph: European capitals tightened security on Friday ahead of New Year's celebrations, erecting concrete barriers in city centers and boosting police numbers after the Islamic State attack in Berlin last week that killed 12 people.

headline.main: Austrian Police Bust Drug-Smuggling Ring, Arrest 50 Suspects
headline.print_headline: Austrian Police Bust Drug-Smuggling Ring, Arrest 50 Suspects

docs.snippet: Austrian police say they have arrested 50 people and seized cocaine, heroin, marijuana and amphetamines following a three-year investigation into a suspected drug-smuggling ring....
docs.lead_paragraph: Austrian police say they have arrested 50 people and seized cocaine, heroin, marijuana and amphetamines following a three-year investigation into a suspected drug-smuggling ring.

headline.main: Plane Carrying CEO of Superior Beverage, Five Others Vanishes in Ohio
headline.print_headline: Plane Carrying CEO of Superior Beverage, Five Others Vanishes in Ohio

docs.snippet: A small plane carrying the chief executive of an Ohio-based liquor distribution company and his wife and sons disappeared over Lake Erie shortly after taking off on Thursday night near Cleveland, the company said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A small plane carrying the chief executive of an Ohio-based liquor distribution company and his wife and sons disappeared over Lake Erie shortly after taking off on Thursday night near Cleveland, the company said on Friday.
